title: s0lidus
author: s0lidus
content: Dice -We're giving away 11 different prizes.Rules- Only 1 reward per player.- All coins except Playmoney are allowed.- The first player to hit the first dice bet after 7,999,999,999 using each of the coins on the site will win a prize.- Payout must be 2x or more.- Minimum 3 active days on CryptoGames account.- Minimum bet: 0.00001 BTC, 0.0001 ETH, 0.0006 BNB, 0.002 LTC, 0.01 SOL, 2 DOGE, 0.001 XMR, 0.01 ETC, 0.0015 BCH, 0.004 DASH, 0.05 GAS- To claim reward, player has to report in chat within 5 minutes after hitting the required BetID.- If the bet doesn't fit requirements or player doesn't claim reward, rules above will apply to the next eligible bet until we have a winner.More info about Crypto.Games on this thread.Catch the winning spirit!

comments.author: NobFox
comments.body: Quote from: s0lidus on June 13, 2023, 01:51:42 PM Dice -We're giving away 11 different prizes.Rules- Only 1 reward per player.- All coins except Playmoney are allowed.- The first player to hit the first dice bet after 7,999,999,999 using each of the coins on the site will win a prize.- Payout must be 2x or more.- Minimum 3 active days on CryptoGames account.- Minimum bet: 0.00001 BTC, 0.0001 ETH, 0.0006 BNB, 0.002 LTC, 0.01 SOL, 2 DOGE, 0.001 XMR, 0.01 ETC, 0.0015 BCH, 0.004 DASH, 0.05 GAS- To claim reward, player has to report in chat within 5 minutes after hitting the required BetID.- If the bet doesn't fit requirements or player doesn't claim reward, rules above will apply to the next eligible bet until we have a winner.More info about Crypto.Games on this thread.Catch the winning spirit!Best of luck everyone!

comments.author: s0lidus
comments.body: Winners were rewarded yesterday. Congrats all!
